text:
Hello, everyone!

Can you tell me how to change the access of users to the products inside the HubSpot?

I would like that only Super Admin can create and modify products
Has anyone had any experience with <http://customer.io|customer.io>? Would you say HubSpot can achieve what they can? Or do you find they work well together?

Hey there, I’m happy to answer any specific functionality questions you might have.

I don’t have first hand experience with <http://customer.io|customer.io> but if you tell me about something you’re hoping to do, I can tell you about how you might do it with HubSpot.
Hi! Does anyone know when the recordings of Developer Day 2021 will be available? It was a great event and I'd love to share with my team who couldn't attend live.
Within the next few days. We will post this slack when we get the recording uploaded. Also all attendees that registered will get an email.
additionally the recording should be posted to our youtube channel, so Subscribing there is a good way to get notified right away.
<@U2H3TT8F2>, any update on release of this feature?
Let me check in with the team on this.
blog list rss feed does not include meta description, is there anyway to add it in the rss.xml, Thanks!
